Hatchling Manager McCoy:
What, are you afraid of Hatchlings? I've heard you are good enough to deal with them.
Come on. Show me your ability. The Hatchlings under my control will be a good match for you.
I don't mean you have to deal with them alone. A weird boy called Tarti or Tart has been bothering me, questioning about the nature of Hatchlings. You should team up with him.
How about starting it now, or do you need more time?
